Create(AssetBaseCollection, String, IAccountSelectionStrategy, AssetCreationOptions) Create(AssetBaseCollection, String, IAccountSelectionStrategy, AssetCreationOptions)

Edit

Returns a new empty IAsset within one selected storage account from storageAccountNames based on the default IAccountSelectionStrategy.

public static IAsset Create(this AssetBaseCollection assets, string assetName, IAccountSelectionStrategy strategy, AssetCreationOptions options)<ExtensionAttribute>
Public Shared Function Create(assets As AssetBaseCollection, assetName As String, strategy As IAccountSelectionStrategy, options As AssetCreationOptions) As IAsset
Parameters
assets
AssetBaseCollection AssetBaseCollection

The AssetBaseCollection instance.

assetName
String String

The asset name.

strategy
IAccountSelectionStrategy IAccountSelectionStrategy

The IAccountSelectionStrategy used to select a storage account for the new asset.

options
AssetCreationOptions AssetCreationOptions

The AssetCreationOptions.

Returns
IAsset IAsset

A new empty IAsset within one selected storage account from the provided IAccountSelectionStrategy.

CreateAsync(AssetBaseCollection, String, IAccountSelectionStrategy, AssetCreationOptions, CancellationToken) CreateAsync(AssetBaseCollection, String, IAccountSelectionStrategy, AssetCreationOptions, CancellationToken)

Edit

Returns a Task<TResult> instance for a new empty IAsset asset within one selected storage account from storageAccountNames based on the default IAccountSelectionStrategy.

public static Task<IAsset> CreateAsync(this AssetBaseCollection assets, string assetName, IAccountSelectionStrategy strategy, AssetCreationOptions options, CancellationToken token)<ExtensionAttribute>

String String

The asset name.

strategy

The IAccountSelectionStrategy used to select a storage account for the new asset.

The AssetCreationOptions.

token
CancellationToken CancellationToken

The CancellationToken instance used for cancellation.

Returns

A Task<TResult> instance for a new empty IAsset within one selected storage account from the given IAccountSelectionStrategy.
